short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Floodgate hides unwanted content on the Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Floodgate mutes unwanted or triggering content on Twitter. Don't want to see racial slurs before breakfast? We can help with that. To view a muted tweet, hover your mouse over it.  

***Currently in alpha testing.***

Simply install the extension and Floodgate scans your Twitter timeline to mute content according to rules you choose. Feedback welcome at @civicworkbench.
